name: AI Playground
title: BioImage Archive AI Playground
subtitle: Explore how AI models perform on different datasets
body_text: This is a collection of models from the BioImage Model zoo that have been applied to datasets from the BioImage Archive. You can explore the outputs of several models on a dataset to get an idea of what is the most suitable model for a specific image. Or you can investigate how a model works on different datasets and see how widely-applicable the model is. You can also preview the predictions on a selected group of models and datasets below.

collections.name: datasets
collections.title: Benchmark Datasets
collections.subtitle: A selection of AI related datasets which were benchmarked

collections.name: models
collections.title: Benchmark Models
collections.subtitle: A selection of Bioimage Model Zoo models benchmarked on BioImage Archive datasets
